attributes.action: Make United Kingdom a true secular state where the church and the state are separate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Secularism asserts the freedom of religion, and freedom from the government imposition of religion upon the people, within a state that is neutral on matters of belief, and gives no state privileges or subsidies to any religions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
